description.value:
Usage drawn on a shield

This rune resembles a broken arrow. While the shield is raised, it also grants the bearer a +1 status bonus to AC against physical ranged attacks.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.impossible-playtest-effects.Item.janzhnKlCAeVkYHk]{Effect: Oljinex, Rune of Cowards' Bane}

Invocation (illusion, mental, visual) The rune creates an illusion in the minds of all creatures adjacent to the rune-bearer that lasts for 1 round. The illusion is of a large impassable wall blocking all paths away from the rune-bearer. Creatures affected by this invocation can't willing move further away from the rune bearer for 1 round or until they disbelieve the illusion, usually by using a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action against your class DC.
